Description: Gold finger-ring; hoop composed of a fluted band of gold; the bezel is formed by a convex oblong green glass paste in gold setting, with obliquely fluted border.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (868)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Rev Greville John Chester
